abstract: In the Norwegian capital, it turns out, it's all about light roasts -- and Oliver Strand is a convert.
snippet: In the Norwegian capital, it turns out, it's all about light roasts -- and Oliver Strand is a convert.
lead_paragraph: Over at the T Magazine blog, our sometime contributor and resident coffee expert Oliver Strand visits Oslo and surveys the coffee scene. In the Norwegian capital, it turns out, it's all about light roasts -- and Mr. Strand is a convert.

headline.main: In Oslo's Coffeeshops, Lighter Roasts Are the Rage
